data.title: 2016 Employee Service Awards
data.meta_description: Recipients of the 2016 Employee Service Awards
data.text:
Congratulations to the following recipients of the 2016 Employee Service Award for serving 35, 30, 25, and 20 years with the County of Sonoma!

Celebrating 35 Years of Service

Celebrating 30 Years of Service

Celebrating 25 Years of Service

Celebrating 20 Years of Service

See list of 2016 Employee Service Award recipients for 15, 10, and 5 years of service
